items.text: Due to the specifics of Android threading, we cannot run network tasks on the same thread as the UI thread.
items.href: Android AsyncTask HTTP GET request Tutorial | by Jason Cromer | Medium

items.text: After that, extend the class AsyncTask.
items.href: Android AsyncTask HTTP GET request Tutorial | by Jason Cromer | Medium

items.text: Now, you’ll be bothered because you need to implement AsyncTask’s override methods.
items.href: Android AsyncTask HTTP GET request Tutorial | by Jason Cromer | Medium

items.text: If you have the options to left click and “generate” its override methods, select “doInBackground()” and “onPostExecute”.
items.href: Android AsyncTask HTTP GET request Tutorial | by Jason Cromer | Medium
